title: Why is it so hard to find an attractive single woman? - Quora

response.answer_text: Information gap. There are a great many attractive, single women out there - you just don’t know they are there, and they don’t know you are looking. There are also a lot who stick with an unhappy relationship because, like you, they think they have few other good options. What’s the solution? Who knows - but someone will become a billionaire when they figure it out. Online dating was supposed to solve this problem. It didn’t.

It’s a little hard. Finding an attractive single woman who is not a certified crazy psycho who only want to eat your brains while you are sleeping and then want to rip out your intestines and feast on them like it’s Thanksgiving day, while displaying the temperament of a rabid Pit Bull on crack is even harder.
